name: Art of Stealth
description:
As an inexplicably sentient painting, you lived a life of freedom. But you were good. Too good. And eventually, you caught the eyes of art critics.

This art museum is now your prison, and it’s your job to escape! Sure, there are guards (like, LOTS of 'em) but you won’t let this stop you right? Your liberty is at stake! You must use stealth techniques to evade the guards and waddle to sweet, sweet victory!
